Author: danw
Content: You can buy the soundtrack album :)

Author: yaacovtp
Content: If you want to get your stuff on a social news site you'd  better start making friends now. A disproportionate numbers of diggs on the front page come from a small percentage of users.

Author: rms
Content: At this point, Digg and Reddit are hard to use unless you game them. It's so random as to whether it gets dugg/buried or up'd/down'd at the beginning. I hope you have a lot of friends with the right accounts or a way of paying $1/Digg.
